project.name: soc
project.description: The Gentoo Summer of Code subproject oversees Gentoo's participation in the 2007 Google Summer of Code.

longdescription.p: For the third year running, Google is organising a Summer of Code, funding students to work on open-source projects over the summer. This year, Gentoo is participating as a mentoring organisation.

body.p: We are sorry, but propositions are not up yet. Feel free to pop up and discuss directly with us on #gentoo-soc on irc.freenode.net.
Stay tuned for more info, coming very soon.
